title: Take Me With You
lyrics:
Long night, wake up
Tears in your makeup
Cry in the kitchen
Quiet conviction
Say that you're leaving
Think you don't need me

Well, that's probably true but

I still need you 'cause



I'm a mess these days

No, you don't have to stay



Just take me with you when you go, go, go

I know the things I said before, oh no

Don't let it come between us

Just hold on to the feeling

When the distance starts to grow, grow, grow

Just take me with you when you go



Six weeks, six months

I forget how long

I kept you waiting

Testing your patience

Our hearts don't break

They just rearrange

Cover the bruises

Try to get through this, but



I'm a mess these days

No, you don't have to stay



Just take me with you when you go, go, go

I know the things I said before, oh no

Don't let it come between us

Just hold on to the feeling

When the distance starts to grow, grow, grow

Just take me with you when you go



Deep down in your soul

It's hard to be alone

And I'm [?] I know, sometimes



Just take me with you when you go, go, go

I know the things I said before, oh no

Don't let it come between us

Just hold on to the feeling

When the distance starts to grow, grow, grow

Just take me with you when you go
